attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Interest rates in this country are extreamly high compaired to the EU. If our prices were to increase with inflation then we would simply buy in France, Germany, Spain etc. I believe that we will become the sick child of Europe if we don't join. Most people will disagree but think of the benefits; you don't loose money every time you change currencys, mortgages and loans will be cheaper and we will realise exactly how much more we are paying for goods and services in this country.Not to mension the political no no subject this has become. If all the parties said "YES" to the euro there wouldn't be an issue! Start the revolution ......

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
